nodes.text: Nonia Daal was a female Iktotchi Force sensitive who along with Taelo was instructed by a teacher during the Galactic Civil War. At one point, they fought killers on Onderon, and after their teacher's death, the two took on the assignment of protecting the village of Torosh from pirates and met the mercenary Om'rahk.
Nonia appears in the opening story in Fantasy Flight Games' 2015 roleplaying game sourcebook Keeping the Peace.
